languages.text: {n}Арджента даже отшатывается на миг. Затем ее темные глаза вспыхивают:{/n} "Как смеешь ты меня в чем-то упрекать?! Речь о пособничестве Архиврагу! Человека, который себя им запятнал, ничем не оправдать!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Арджента даже отшатывается на миг. Затем ее темные глаза вспыхивают:{/n} "Как смеешь ты меня в чем-то упрекать?! Речь о пособничестве Хаосу! Человека, который себя им запятнал, ничем не оправдать!"

languages.text: {n}Argenta recoils, but the next moment her dark eyes ignite with fury.{/n} "How dare you admonish me? We are speaking of abetting the Archenemy! A person who has tainted themselves thus can never justify their actions!"
languages.original_text: {n}Арджента даже отшатывается на миг. Затем ее темные глаза вспыхивают:{/n} "Как смеешь ты меня в чем-то упрекать?! Речь о пособничестве Архиврагу! Человека, который себя им запятнал, ничем не оправдать!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta recoils, but the next moment her dark eyes light up with fury.{/n} "How dare you admonish me? We are talking about abetting Chaos! A person who has tainted themselves thus can never justify it!"

{n}Argenta recoils, but the next moment her dark eyes light up with fury.{/n} "How dare you admonish me? We are talking about abetting Chaos! A person who has tainted themselves thus can never justify it!"

{n}Argenta recoils, but the next moment her dark eyes ignite with fury.{/n} "How dare you admonish me? We are speaking of abetting Chaos! A person who has tainted themselves thus can never justify their actions!"

{n}Argenta recoils, but the next moment her dark eyes ignite with fury.{/n} "How dare you admonish me? We are speaking of abetting the Archenemy! A person who has tainted themselves thus can never justify their actions!"

{n}Argenta recoils, but the next moment her dark eyes ignite with fury.{/n} "How dare you admonish me? We are speaking of abetting Chaos! A person who has tainted themselves thus can never justify their actions!"

{n}Argenta recoils, but the next moment her dark eyes ignite with fury.{/n} "How dare you admonish me? We are speaking of abetting Chaos! A person who has tainted themselves thus can never justify their actions!"

{n}Argenta recoils, but the next moment her dark eyes ignite with fury.{/n} "How dare you admonish me? We are speaking of abetting the Archenemy! A person who has tainted themselves thus can never justify their actions!"

languages.text: {n}Argenta se sobresalta, pero sus oscuros ojos se llenan de furia al instante.{/n} «¿Cómo se atreve a reprenderme? ¡Estamos hablando de ser cómplices del Archienemigo! ¡Una persona que se ha corrompido nunca puede justificar sus acciones!».
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta recoils, but the next moment her dark eyes ignite with fury.{/n} "How dare you admonish me? We are speaking of abetting the Archenemy! A person who has tainted themselves thus can never justify their actions!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta se sobresalta, pero sus oscuros ojos se llenan de furia al instante.{/n} «¿Cómo se atreve a reprenderme? ¡Estamos hablando de ser cómplices al Caos! Una persona que se ha corrompido nunca puede justificar sus acciones».

languages.text: {n}Argenta schreckt zurück, doch schon im nächsten Moment flammt in ihren dunklen Augen der Zorn auf.{/n} "Wie könnt Ihr es wagen, mich zu tadeln? Wir sprechen davon, dem Erzfeind zu helfen! Eine Person, die sich derart besudelt hat, kann ihr Handeln niemals rechtfertigen!"
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta recoils, but the next moment her dark eyes ignite with fury.{/n} "How dare you admonish me? We are speaking of abetting the Archenemy! A person who has tainted themselves thus can never justify their actions!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta schreckt zurück, doch schon im nächsten Moment flammt in ihren dunklen Augen der Zorn auf.{/n} "Wie könnt Ihr es wagen, mich zu tadeln? Wir sprechen davon, dem Chaos zu helfen! Eine Person, die sich derart besudelt hat, kann ihr Handeln niemals rechtfertigen!"

languages.text: {n}Argenta fait un pas en arrière, mais l'instant d'après, son regard s'enflamme de rage :{/n} « Comment osez-vous me sermonner ? Nous parlons de cautionner les menées du Grand Ennemi ! Une personne corrompue ne pourra jamais justifier ses actions ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta recoils, but the next moment her dark eyes ignite with fury.{/n} "How dare you admonish me? We are speaking of abetting the Archenemy! A person who has tainted themselves thus can never justify their actions!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta fait un pas en arrière, mais l'instant d'après, son regard s'enflamme de rage :{/n} « Comment osez-vous me sermonner ? Nous parlons d'encourager le Chaos ! Une personne corrompue ne pourra jamais justifier ses actions ! »

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔畏缩了一下，但随后，她的眼中就燃起了熊熊怒火。{/n}“你竟敢教训我？我们现在讨论的是传播混沌大敌教义的问题！自甘堕落之人没有资格自我辩解！”
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta recoils, but the next moment her dark eyes ignite with fury.{/n} "How dare you admonish me? We are speaking of abetting the Archenemy! A person who has tainted themselves thus can never justify their actions!"

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔畏缩了一下，但随后，她的眼中就燃起了熊熊怒火。{/n}“你竟敢教训我？我们现在讨论的是传播混沌教义的问题！自甘堕落之人没有资格自我辩解！”

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタはひるむが、次の瞬間、彼女の黒い瞳は怒りに燃え上がる。{/n}「貴様が我を諭すとでも？渾沌の勢力の幇助という罪の重さはわからないのか！このように自分の手を汚した者は、己の行動を正当化することなどできない！」
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta recoils, but the next moment her dark eyes ignite with fury.{/n} "How dare you admonish me? We are speaking of abetting the Archenemy! A person who has tainted themselves thus can never justify their actions!"

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタはビクッと身を引いたものの、次の瞬間、その暗い瞳は怒りで燃え上がった。{/n}「なぜ私を嗜めるような事を？話の流れは渾沌の教唆の件だろう！そうやって自分の手を汚した者は、己の行動を正当化することなどできない！」
{n}アルジェンタはひるむが、次の瞬間、彼女の黒い瞳は怒りに燃え上がる。{/n}「貴様が我を諭すとでも？渾沌の勢力の幇助という罪の重さはわからないのか！このように自分の手を汚した者は、己の行動を正当化することなどできない！」

languages.text: {n}Argenta irkiliyor ama kara gözleri bir an sonra öfkeyle yanıyor.{/n} "Ne cüretle beni azarlarsın? Şerbaşı'na yataklıktan bahsediyoruz! Şahsiyetine leke sürmüş kişiler, eylemlerinin haklılığından bahsedemez!"
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta recoils, but the next moment her dark eyes ignite with fury.{/n} "How dare you admonish me? We are speaking of abetting the Archenemy! A person who has tainted themselves thus can never justify their actions!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta irkiliyor ama kara gözleri bir an sonra öfkeyle yanıyor.{/n} "Ne cüretle beni azarlarsın? Şerbaşı'na yataklıktan bahsediyoruz! Şahsiyetine leke sürmüş kişiler, eylemlerinin haklılığından bahsedemez!"
